metadata.name: The Tales of Love
metadata.description:
When the moment of Love was captured at the Monument of Love.
It is said that when you are with someone you truly love, you glow differently and everything goes perfectly.

The moment was just perfect in here everything fell right into the place and the precious moment was captured.

This 1/1 is very close to my heart because it showcases my work with the perfection, which I love to maintain in everything.

Artist: Apoorv Shrivastava
Location: Tajmahal, Agra, India
Edition:  1/1
Dimentions: 3854 x 4817 pixels
Collection: SOULMATES
